Chapter.Title: Practice Exercise 5-10 Solution
Chapter.Data:
from Ugc import Ugc
clock = Ugc() # get the local hours for time (0, 0, 0) hour1 = clock.convert_to_local_hours(0, 0, 0)
# get the local hours after 1 minute has elapsed hour2 = clock.convert_to_local_hours(0, 1, 0)
# hour2-hour1 is the number of hours in 1 minute of time aboveground. Multiply by 60 to get the answer. print 'The number of hours of time below ground that are in an hour of time above ground is ' +str((hour2-hour1)*60)
